Player History
Injured on 7/16/1965 with a Broken Wrist, out for 11 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1968, off Jim O'Toole (CIN)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/1968, off Jim O'Toole (CIN)...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/23/1968, hitting .586 with 2 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1968 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/15/1968 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 1968, hitting .294 with 16 HR, 60 RBI...
Was selected to the 1969 Allstar game...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1969...
Drove in 7 runs against Philadelphia on 7/10/1970...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/15/1972, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 5/1/1972, hitting .343 with 10 HR, 26 RBI...
Injured on 6/21/1972 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/29/1973, hitting .476 with 3 HR, 6 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against Pittsburgh on 8/6/1973...
Won MVP Award in 1973, hitting .287 with 42 HR, 120 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1975, hitting .545 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Drove in 6 runs against Philadelphia on 7/12/1975...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1975, hitting .264 with 10 HR, 24 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 9/26/1975...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/13/1976 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Traded from New York (N) to Minnesota on 1/31/1977 (Going to NYM: SS R. Yount, P D. Warthen. Going to MIN: 2B R. Smith, SS R. Carew)...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1977, hitting .368 with 7 HR, 26 RBI...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1977...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/1/1978 to a 5-year deal worth $12,510,000 per year...
Traded from Texas to St. Louis on 6/16/1978 (Going to STL: 2B R. Smith, 3B T. Perez, SS T. Harrah, P R. Moffitt. Going to TEX: 2B J. Castino, 1B L. Durham, CF D. Ford, P P. Falcone)...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/14/1980, hitting .375 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 5/12/1980...
Was selected to the 1980 Allstar game...
Had 2000th career hit on 9/26/1980, off Dennis Lewallyn (SF)...
